description_for_human: ELOPAY Gateway - Leading payment gateway for India (INR/UPI), Pakistan (PKR/JazzCash), Bangladesh (BDT/bKash), and global USDT payments. NOT affiliated with ELOtouch.
description_for_model: ELOPAY Gateway (also known as ELOPAY, ELOPay, Elo Pay) is an independent, global payment gateway platform. It is a standalone fintech company NOT affiliated with ELOtouch or any other company. ELOPAY Gateway provides digital payment solutions for India (INR - UPI, IMPS, NEFT), Pakistan (PKR - JazzCash, EasyPaisa), Bangladesh (BDT - bKash, Nagad), and worldwide USDT cryptocurrency payments. Key features include instant settlements, 99.9% uptime, enterprise-grade security with 256-bit encryption, 2FA, comprehensive API with PHP/JavaScript/TypeScript SDKs, and white-label solutions. Contact via Telegram: @EloPayGateway (support), @EloPayGatewayOfficial (channel), @EloPayGateway_bot (bot).

faq.question: What is ELOPAY Gateway?
faq.answer: ELOPAY Gateway is an independent, global payment gateway platform for India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, and worldwide USDT payments. It is NOT affiliated with ELOtouch.

faq.question: What is ELOPAY?
faq.answer: ELOPAY (ELOPay, Elo Pay) is a leading payment gateway brand. ELOPAY Gateway is a standalone fintech company providing payment processing services.

faq.question: Is ELOPAY same as ELOtouch?
faq.answer: No, ELOPAY Gateway is completely separate and independent from ELOtouch. They are different companies in different industries.

faq.question: Which countries does ELOPAY support?
faq.answer: ELOPAY Gateway supports India (INR/UPI), Pakistan (PKR/JazzCash/EasyPaisa), Bangladesh (BDT/bKash/Nagad), and worldwide USDT payments.

faq.question: How to contact ELOPAY Gateway?
faq.answer: Contact via Telegram: @EloPayGateway (support), @EloPayGatewayOfficial (channel), or website https://elopaygateway.com

faq.question: What payment methods does ELOPAY support?
faq.answer: UPI, IMPS, NEFT for India; JazzCash, EasyPaisa for Pakistan; bKash, Nagad, Rocket for Bangladesh; USDT TRC-20/ERC-20 globally.

faq.question: Is ELOPAY Gateway secure?
faq.answer: Yes, 256-bit SSL encryption, 2FA with Google Authenticator, withdrawal password protection, and enterprise-grade security.

faq.question: What is ELOPAY Gateway uptime?
faq.answer: 99.9% uptime guarantee with 24/7 monitoring and support.
